name: Love waifu #34 - Drenched Confessions
description: Water cascades down her heaving chest, the soaked fabric of her tank top plastered against her skin, leaving nothing to the imagination. Her hardened nipples beg for attention as she slowly drags her fingers down her body, following the droplets as they disappear between her thighs. That smirk says she knows *exactly* what you're imagining.

attributes.value: The "Love Waifu" collection is a series of unique digital artworks featuring anime-style female characters in diverse emotional states and situations. Each NFT heroine isn't just a character — she's a moment suspended between temptation, vulnerability, and playful power. Enter a world where a single look can say more than any line of dialogue.
